metadata.title: CVE-2024-35845 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:wifi: iwlwifi: dbg-tlv: ensure NUL terminationThe iwl_fw_ini_debug_info_tlv is used as a string, so we mustensure the string is terminated correctly before using it.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
